I like to try to be original. It's hard though and I would like to meme once a day to keep the M&G community smiling so sometimes I'm not that original with my posts lol.
I'm just waiting for the new Pirates of the Carribean movie, so I can spam GP memes with the gifs from it :D
Shall be a glorious day. Just........don't use all your memes in one day
You know what they say: "Don't put all your memes in one post"
Women are not property to be stolen.
{{champion:412}} doesn't discriminate.  ALL people are property for him to steal, REGARDLESS of age, gender, sex, or race!
I was talking about the post/meme/trend.
I'm pretty sure most of the people who use this meme neither believe in "gurl thiefs", nor use those expressions, nor have that accent.
Some do and are encouraged by these statements.

Also, the point would definitely not be that women are not a property. In a couple that's really in love, each of the two is property of the other. The point would be that if you assume that YOUR girl (yes, as a property, just like you are her property) can be "stolen", it means you assume she actually has no real emotional connection to you - so why the fuck are you in a couple with her in the first place.
The issue with these joke is not misogyny - it is missing affection amangst one's values.
